24.3.3 Summarize Results
We cannot judge the skill of the model from a single evaluation. The reason for this is that
neural networks are stochastic, meaning that a diﬀerent speciﬁc model will result when training
the same model conﬁguration on the same data. This is a feature of the network in that it gives
the model its adaptive ability, but requires a slightly more complicated evaluation of the model.
